enumerations.name: DataTypePolicyEnum
enumerations.note: This class lists the supported DataTypePolicies. Aggregated by ISignal.dataTypePolicy

literals.name: ddsService
literals.description:
This literal indicates that this ISignal is used to transport a message as part of a service for Dds.
Tags: atp.EnumerationLiteralIndex=6

literals.name: ddsSignal
literals.description:
This literal indicates that this ISignal is used to transport a signal based signal for Dds.
Tags: atp.EnumerationLiteralIndex=5

literals.name: legacy
literals.description:
In case the System Description doesnâ€™t use a complete Software Component Description (VFB View) this value can be chosen. This supports the inclusion of legacy signals. The aggregation of SwDataDefProps shall be used to configure the "ComSignalDataInvalidValue" and the Data Semantics.
Tags: atp.EnumerationLiteralIndex=0

literals.name: network
literals.description: Ignore any networkRepresentationProps of this ISignal and use the networkRepresentation from the

literals.name: FromComSpec
literals.description:
Please note that the usage does not imply the existence of the SwDataDefProps in the role network Representation aggregated by the SenderComSpec or ReceiverComSpec if an ImplementationData Type is defined.
Tags: atp.EnumerationLiteralIndex=1

literals.name: override
literals.description:
If this value is chosen the requirements specified in the ComSpec (networkRepresentationFromCom specified by the aggregated swDataDefProps.
Tags: atp.EnumerationLiteralIndex=2

literals.name: transformingISignal
literals.description:
This literal indicates that a transformer chain shall be used to communicate the ISignal as UINT8_N over the bus.
Tags: atp.EnumerationLiteralIndex=4
